root.name: Restaurant Empire
root.description: You start off as an aspiring chef ready to open your ownrestaurant but first have to find out how. You go to your uncle who owns his owns restaurant that has turned out to be shut down and he makes you a deal that if you can open it and create a revenue you can have it. You then use the money you have and a very user friendly interface to design your restaurant, menu, and hire employees to create a thriving chain of restaurants. Buy, build, outsell and underprice your competition. Minimum System RequirementsWindows XP / Vista1 GHz processor (1.4 GHz recommended)256MB RAM (512MB recommended)3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)MouseKeyboard
